english.segment1: Chorus: I will wait for the promise, look to the sky. Wait for the promise and leave every lie, Hope for the future and try as I pray. To wait for the promise and live for the day.
english.segment2: We all can speak our minds, about struggles we have known. I guess I have walked a few miles, in deserts of my own. but through the toughest times, the manna still comes down. How could I ever doubt, all the faith I've found
english.segment4: With every step I take, there's provision for my need. A daily glimpse of glory, for my eyes to see. I know when life deceives, the manna will be real. I can never doubt, all the faith I feel
english.segment6: Gonna loose all my fears, let the winds. They come from far away. Gonna dry all my tears, trust the promise God gave. Gonna wait for the promise
